measured_by: Skin conductance response (SCR) / Electrodermal activity recording
justification: "While participants performed the task, their electrodermal responses were monitored as an index of arousal and somatic state activation (Dawson, Schell, & Filion, 2007)."

measured_by: Proportion of utilitarian decisions (number of utilitarian choices divided by total dilemmas)
justification: "For each participant, we computed the proportion of utilitarian decisions by calculating the number of experimental dilemmas in which a utilitarian decision was taken divided by the total number of dilemmas."
construct: Utilitarian moral decision-making / Moral behavior in dilemmas

measured_by: Post-experiment recall questionnaire on 5-point Likert scale
justification: "At the end of the experiment, a recall questionnaire asked participants about how much could they remember about their decisions... The responses were categorized into a 5-point Likert scale ranging from -2 (can't remember anything) to 2 (remember everything)."
construct: Recall of previous decisions / Memory for prior choices
